column5: http://beta.realtor.ca/propertyDetails.aspx?PropertyId=14759117  Mattawa, 500 acres, creek, off the grid, $200,000! Would it be practical for me to own 2 large acreages??

I'd invest a couple hundred bucks in talking to a lawyer or accountant who specializes in real estate and taxes - you may very well be on to something if you can swing it financially and physically.  Not that much different from owning a main residence and a cottage but there may be both an income (tourism rental) and tax (write offs) advantage if you play the system correctly.  Good luck!  Michael
I was kidding about myself owning it! ThAt would be an insane amount of work to maintain!!  Maybe someone here is looking to move to the country?
Why be kidding Chad?  It's only an hour from North Bay according to Google Maps - think about it!  Michael

Chad I wouldn't trade your river for anything, well except maybe a few other brook trout rivers properties.

Chad I wouldn't trade your river for anything, well except maybe a few other brook trout rivers properties. Agreed. Boom creek (the mattawa one) is far less productive than the river through my property.  I need to establish a good walking/atv trail down to the river... rather brutal terrain back there as it stands.
